titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Paliament [sic] for the raising of forces, both horse and foot in severall parts of this kingdom, to resist, suppresse, subdue, and pursue : kill and slay and to put to execution : and by all means to destory such papists, and ill affected persons who have traiterously combined together and entred into association : and which have already raised great forces both horse and foot in severall counties of this kingdom and have plundered, spoyled and destroyed multitudes of His Maiesties good subjects : together with certain instructions for the lord lieutenants, deputy-lievtenants and other officers and commanders in the county of Norfolk, Suffolk, Essex, Cambridge, the Ile of Ely, Hartford and the county of the city of Norwich : as also the resolution and association of the afore said counties.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Paliament [sic] for the raising of forces, both horse and foot in severall parts of this kingdom, to resist, suppresse, subdue, and pursue : kill and slay and to put to execution : and by all means to destory such papists, and ill affected persons who have traiterously combined together and entred into association : and which have already raised great forces both horse and foot in severall counties of this kingdom and have plundered, spoyled and destroyed multitudes of His Maiesties good subjects : together with certain instructions for the lord lieutenants, deputy-lievtenants and other officers and commanders in the county of Norfolk, Suffolk, Essex, Cambridge, the Ile of Ely, Hartford and the county of the city of Norwich : as also the resolution and association of the afore said counties.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husbands and Joh. Franks,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
